message.body: I am so sorry to do this to you, but I REALLY need your help. Please call asap!
###### is out today, so I just sent an email to #### with you and ###### copied. Will let you know what happens...
Cool. I really hope it gets taken care of soon. Your email was very good. Sorry u have to deal with this....
Yeah, tell me about it. Thanks for calling- I really had no idea where to start. Going to give #### until tomorrow morning and then start being a real pain in the ass if necessary ;-)
Never heard back from #### today. Any suggestions on my next move if he doesn't respond by tomorrow morning?
